title: How to Be a Good Hider

steps.headline: Hide fast.
steps.description: If someone is counting to a short number you have to hide pretty fast to make sure they don't run into you.

steps.headline: Hide quietly.
steps.description: You don't want to make a lot of noises while hiding, they'll hear you. And if you see them you can sneak over to somewhere else.

steps.headline: Choose somewhere they don't know of.
steps.description: Go to some place where nobody really goes like in a laundry basket or in a cabinet, it will be harder to find you.

steps.headline: Don't hide with someone.
steps.description: Don't hide with somebody because it will not be that hard to find you, they'll find you both together and it will be one person left of fun!

steps.headline: Try a dark room.
steps.description: Dark rooms may be easier to hide in, since with rooms full of light, you will have to find a good hiding spot. Sitting in the dark will probably make them outlook you, and if they do see you, think you are an object. Maybe somewhere dark like a closet or under your bed.

steps.headline: Try not to wear pants with buttons on the sides.
steps.description: If you do, if you are near the seeker, he/she can hear you. Try wearing shorts or pants with no buttons or zippers.

steps.headline: Set your phone to vibrate(if you have one).
steps.description: It helps when people are near you because they can't really hear you.
